name: Twiddla!
description: Twiddla is a web-based service that helps distributed teams meet virtually and collaborate in real time by providing tools to create mark-ups of live Web sites, uploaded images and documents, or a blank canvas. In addition to an advanced chat feature, Twiddla offers an opportunity for collaborators to speak with one another via PhoneFromHere.com. It involves no plug-ins or downloads, no Flash, no need to work around complex firewalls, no advanced scheduling. It’s available 24-7 and the only requirement is a computer with an internet connection and a web browser. It’s browser-agnostic and free. You don’t even have to sign up to start using the service.

apis.name: Twiddla
apis.description: Twiddla's Application Programming Interface (API) lets you host Twiddla meetings on your own website. You can create new meetings on the fly and embed them into any page you'd like. You can disable the bits you don't want to see, and you can even show your own logo instead of ours.
